review: We met the doctor for suspected covid, despite a negative initial tests, she correctly advised us and asked us to go for further examination. We could get timely advice and medication. She and her team were constantly in touch with us via calls and Whatsapp too.In these times, hats off to Dr. Lakshmi for being there and patiently dealing with each case. Highly recommend her.
Today was our first visit, Doctor was very friendly and helpful. Definitely I will recommend. Patient was treated with care. Thanks
She listens patiently on what others say and then prescribes the medicines ..that's what makes you feel good. Thank you
Friendly doctor who listens to all issues patiently and recommends required course of action. All necessary medicines were given.
Comfortable, precise.Doctor is a good listener and cleared all questions of patient.Thank you doctor
The doctor is Very patient and kind. Highly recommended. She didn’t over prescribe medication. Front desk staff is friendly.
Docter was very thorough in her diagnosis. She explained the issue well. She also shared her number for follow up

Dr. is polite and patient. **** *********. Staff needs to do better and respect the sequence and not be biased. 
**** ****** ****** ****** *** ************ ******** ** ** ********** ** *** *****
very cool and have patience..listens for all our queries and replies for the same . visited today due to some post covid issue and got prescription for the same .
**** **** ******* Diagnosed the issue properly and helped in quick resolution. Answered all the questions patiently
